column2: 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: 62 yo wm. started about one year ago.  I am a pharmacist.  I have tried everything to treat my IBS of about 30 years, even other pro-biotics.  It has worked like a miracle drug.  LL Quadrant pain gone and stools are regular.  I do have some regular reflux like indigestion which I assume is from the drug.  Unfortunately, I have recommended it to others and it does not work for everyone and makes some people's symptoms worse.

column2: Ellie , 75 or over Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: This medicine has saved my life I do believe, as for 10 years or more I had BS and I have now got my life back.  The Dr. that recommended it to me, I have called him and told him how I have been helped, 90%. I take one Align a day and have been taking it for over one year and half.

column2: lincoln park, 75 or over Female  (Patient)

column9: I started taking this to become more regular. Was doing fine until I finished the first week. I had very bad cramps in my lower extremities. Not sure if I should continue taking it but I spent quite a bit on this product so I probably will. Anyone else experience similar results?

column2: Cate, 65-74 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I started taking Align about 6 weeks ago. In the last weeks I have had horrible bloating, to the point I have bought a larger size of pants. By evening I can barely stand it. Going to the bathroom does not help, even after a healthy bm I still feel bloated and full! Going to stop this maddness and toss this medication. Did not feel this badly before I started taking it.

column2: Satisfied Align user, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I had IBS for many years, and tried to control it using Immodium.  Then I tried various probiotics (e.g., Culturelle, Dura Flora, etc.), but no probiotics worked until I tried Align.  It works very well, whereas some of the others actually made things worse.  Everyone is different, so it might not work for you.  But if you try it, you should use it for a few days, because it takes your system some time to get used to most probiotics.

column2: rz, 65-74 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Started taking this for intestinal problems following a course of antibiotics. After a few doses had bloody stools, cramps, aches all over my body especially my joints. Couldn't control my bowels or bladder. Took immodium and it helped. I will never take this again. Also it contains artificial sweetners, which are causing headaches and flushing.

column2: 45-54 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)

column2: Susan, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: If you are thinking about taking Align be careful,very careful! I had been taking Align for my cc problem needless to say I  have been suffering with severe burning from my throat all the way down to my rectum, it feels like I drank battery acid or have been poisioned,my poop is yellow, I can only eat cream potatoes and drink water and I still suffer from this burning pain. I thought about going to the emergency room but kept thinking it would get better, it has not, I will probably go to hospital tomorrow. Just a word of advice there are no warnings on the Align Box that should have told me something. I hope I have not done permanent damage to my gastrointestinal tract. This is powerful medicine.PLEASE BEWARE!!!!

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: My Dr. told me to take this to alleviate diarrhea caused by taking an antibiotic. That was the worst idea ever! It intensified the diarrhea. I will never take this probiotic again.

column2: sandic, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)

column2: 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: align is like a life saver I have IBS and my DOC recomended I take it and I am so thankfull for it I have very few flare ups I would recomended this to anyone with stomache problems :-)

column2: Annie, 65-74 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I am in my 4th week of taking Align. My entire digestive system was out of whack (heartburn, gas, stomach pains)so my dr recommended this. It has worked but my upper arms are sore and I am fatigued all the time. I may switch to another probiotic and see if Align was the cause of these side effects. I have severe IBS-D and take Lotronex, one mg twice a day. It has been a life saver. Ladies with severe IBS-D, ask your doctor about it. There is no generic and it is extremely expensive. I have suffered the IBS since 1981 and used to take Questran. Lotronex is wonderful.

column2: marbal, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I took it for the good bacteria. It has caused me severe heartburn and stomach acid pain. Which I never had before. Quit taking it and no more heartburn or stomach pain.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I started taking this drug 2 weeks ago because I was taking philips colon health and that was helping a lot and figured this would be that much better...After about a week of taking it my bm's were mostly normal and all was good there but I started getting the worst cases of heartburn!!!  I thought it was from foods I had eaten. I thought it was from taking advil for a AF. But I never thought it could be from this stuff until just today when I took it and within 10 minutes it's back!!! Now I see so many others posting the same messages....I am so done!!! I will be switching back to Philips colon health and going to be happy with good enough!!!!

column2: BBG , 55-64 Female  (Patient)
column9: I started taking this med following surgery to help restore the "good" bacteria to my GI tract. It seemed to help restore normal regularity of BMs to at least 1 a day. Am in 8th week of treatment but have recently noticed that my sense of taste has changed and I am experiencing acid reflux. Not sure whether these symptoms are related to taking Align.

column2: Di , 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I started taking Align for gas/acidity (too high) and BM (too low or none) issues. I have 3 days left on my 28 days on align. I take it before bed every night and I have a BM first thing every morning. It was uncomfortable at first but improved over time. I hope my horrible symptoms don't come back after I finish my Align.

column2: Denny, 45-54 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have been talking Align for going on two weeks. The reason was that all my life I never have regular BM. There are times I go 7 days without going, but usually it is 3 to 5 days.Since I have been taking Align, I go anywhere from 3 to 10 times a day, depending on how much I eat. It is VERY liquid and I have also seen traces of mucus. I have also suffered some of the MOST intense and severe intestinal distress I have EVER known. Now within 2 hours of taking Align, I become extremely bloated, crampy and gassy. My lower abdomen is EXTREMELY tender to the touch. It feels like I have been repeatedly punched on the stomach. Can't sleep at night for my stomach rumbling, and gurgling, and cramping.I have quit taking this after, and DO NOT recommend this to anyone.

column2: Cali, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I took this for 5 mths. for a more natural approach to I.B.S. w/ constipation and unfortuately it didn't help.

column2: dixie, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have been on align for about 2 and a half weeks now. I have had more frequent headaches and blisters in my mouth. I still get some stomach aches, but I don't have to worry about rushing to the bathroom as much as I used to. Before align I experienced IBS symptoms and was recently diagnosed to be lactose intolerant (which if you don't know you have it can be horrible to live with). Overall, align has helped, but leaves me uncomfortably gassy throughout the day.

column2: lvtnns, 65-74 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)

column2: Nicole1, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: My experience has been horrible. I suffer from constipation and hoped this would work. I have been taking it for a week and have such extreme bloating and stomach pain that I feel bruised from the inside. I have only had 2 BMs. I will quiting this treatment today. I made the decision to take it over my Christmas break (teacher) and have had an absolutely awful week. I researched opionios of others and thought that if I could just hang it there it would get better. However, it doesn't tell you that if you are experiencing pain to stop. It encourages you to hang in there. I am assuming that the bacteria in my body must be worse than anyones elses or else the Align wouldn't be working so darn hard and debilitating me in the process. I hope others have had better expriences. I wish that I could go back a week and never purchased this supplement. Best wishs-insane in Indiana.

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I've been taking Align for 4 weeks now. I haven't been diagnosed with IBS-D because I've been controlling it myself (3 years) without my Dr's help. Anyway.. I used to take Immodium about two times a week & I think in the passed month i've only taken it 2 times.. So that's twice a week to twice a month. I definitely feel that Align his helping me. The only draw back i'm seeing is that i'm gassy in the morning when i wake up. Maybe i should switch to taking it at dinner (early evening) instead of before i go to bed at night (late evening). I won't say it's perfect for me because i had an issue just two days ago, however, i was having issues 2/3 times a week before i started taking Align. It is a pricey medication, but you can get a good deal (right now) by purchasing it on Ebay. I paid full price on my first box and then bought a 2 pack of 28 on-line for the same price I paid in-store. I will continue to take it unless it stops helping. I do recommend it for people to try who are as desperate as i was to stop the panicky feeling of *where's the bathroom?? where??* when you're out & about. You know what i mean. :)

column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: Haven't stopped going to bathroom yet. Now over a week...losing weight..losing everything.....never take this drug!!!!!!!!!!!!!

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: What you have to be aware of with probiotics is that many of them either contain soy or milk. This probiotic has milk. So if you are a person like myself who is already suffering from gas, these two ingredients dont serve to help the problem. I have also bought the more expensive flora source and found the capsule hard to pass. CVS and most drug stores have an acidophillus that is inexpensive, 4.99 for 100. I take one after each meal and it has help cut down my gas and keeps me regular.  My doctor told me I could take 6 a day if I wanted, that it would not hurt me. Hope this info is helpful, Good luck and God Bless.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I began taking Align for my IBS symptoms... instead of being extremely bloated, crampy & constipated, I'm now going to the bathroom at least once a day, but it's never solid... and I can't hold my movements anymore.  It's really just more like diarrhea. I bought a 7 week pack & am almost 3 weeks into it... plan on taking it the full 7 weeks to see what happens. Hoping it'll do more good than harm.

column2: Gramma, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)

Will start taking every other day and see if that subsides because I don't want to go back on prescriptions.
